title: Educational Software Development Specialist Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary programming and understanding of instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Learners engage in projects within a blended environment using personal devices, emphasizing practical skills through context-specific problem-solving.

learning_goals: Learners can apply core skills required for educational software development (programming, UX/UI design) with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can create software design documents reflecting learning theories and instructional design principles.
Learners can develop educational software prototypes using agile methodologies in team-based projects.
Learners can analyze user feedback and evaluation data to inform product improvements.

resources: Development Environment Tools (IDE, Version Control System)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
